symc.name: SC_MANAGER_ALL_ACCESS
symc.desc: Includes STANDARD_RIGHTS_REQUIRED, in addition to all access rights specific to service control manager

symf.name: SC_MANAGER_CREATE_SERVICE
symf.desc: Required to call the CreateService function to create a service object and add it to the database.

symf.name: SC_MANAGER_CONNECT
symf.desc: Required to connect to the service control manager

symf.name: SC_MANAGER_ENUMERATE_SERVICE
symf.desc: Required to call the EnumServicesStatus or EnumServicesStatusEx function to list the services that are in the database. Required to call the NotifyServiceStatusChange function to receive notification when any service is created or deleted

symf.name: SC_MANAGER_LOCK
symf.desc: Required to call the LockServiceDatabase function to acquire a lock on the database

symf.name: SC_MANAGER_MODIFY_BOOT_CONFIG
symf.desc: Required to call the NotifyBootConfigStatus function

symf.name: SC_MANAGER_QUERY_LOCK_STATUS
symf.desc: Required to call the QueryServiceLockStatus function to retrieve the lock status information for the database
